content.text: Match ends, Liverpool 4, Arsenal 0.
Second Half ends, Liverpool 4, Arsenal 0.
Offside, Arsenal. Laurent Koscielny tries a through ball, but Alexandre Lacazette is caught offside.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Attempt saved. Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by James Milner.
Attempt missed. Olivier Giroud (Arsenal) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Mesut Özil with a cross following a set piece situation.
Alexandre Lacazette (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool).
Attempt saved. Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marko Grujic.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Alberto Moreno.
Substitution, Liverpool. Marko Grujic replaces Emre Can.
Attempt missed. Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Danny Welbeck.
Substitution, Liverpool. James Milner replaces Roberto Firmino.
Goal!  Liverpool 4, Arsenal 0. Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) header from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Mohamed Salah with a cross.
Foul by Jordan Henderson (Liverpool).
Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Liverpool. Daniel Sturridge replaces Sadio Mané.
Rob Holding (Arsenal) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Rob Holding (Arsenal).
Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Alberto Moreno (Liverpool) because of an injury.
Alberto Moreno (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Francis Coquelin (Arsenal).
Attempt saved. Sadio Mané (Liverpool) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Alexandre Lacazette (Arsenal) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Olivier Giroud with a headed pass.
Offside, Arsenal. Granit Xhaka tries a through ball, but Héctor Bellerín is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Mesut Özil (Arsenal) left footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left.
Substitution, Arsenal. Alexandre Lacazette replaces Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain.
Substitution, Arsenal. Olivier Giroud replaces Alexis Sánchez.
Attempt blocked. Emre Can (Liverpool) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Joseph Gomez.
Nacho Monreal (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mohamed Salah (Liverpool).
Goal!  Liverpool 3, Arsenal 0. Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner following a fast break.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Dejan Lovren.
Attempt missed. Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left.
Attempt saved. Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Petr Cech.
Sadio Mané (Liverpool) wins a free kick on the left wing.

Jordan Henderson (Liverpool) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mesut Özil (Arsenal).
Attempt blocked. Alexis Sánchez (Arsenal) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Mesut Özil.
Attempt missed. Mesut Özil (Arsenal) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Granit Xhaka with a headed pass.
Substitution, Arsenal. Francis Coquelin replaces Aaron Ramsey.
Second Half begins Liverpool 2, Arsenal 0.
First Half ends, Liverpool 2, Arsenal 0.
